entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
